attributes.action: Make child maintenance service take into consideration a parents outgoings
attributes.background: As a father I have my two children on a shared basis I pay for everything when my kids are in my care as there mother doesn't provide my with anything for them the child maintenance service should take into consideration outgoings from wages as living costs are high so it's fair on both parents

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168993
